data.title: 7 Golden Python Packages with Code

data.text:
Python has a limitless number of packages used in everyday programming. Some packages have so instigated the interest in working with Python. Here is a list of some seven fantastic packages which are rarely used, but it is a must-know for Python developers. All the packages are explained with a simple code to illustrate the usage of the packages in the code.

1. Word Cloud:

Sometimes we wonder how to achieve an image masked with words. With this package and Python, we can create numerous word cloud images. Visualization of words in a masked area, like shown in the output, can be easily achieved with this package. This package provides options like a one-word cloud, Arabic word cloud, Chinese word cloud, Image-colored word cloud.
